statements: DELETE FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price > 500.00;
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_id = 100 AND category = 'Electronics';
DELETE FROM products WHERE stock_quantity < 10 AND price > 100.00;
DELETE FROM ProductInventory WHERE product_id = 100 AND available_quantity < 5;
DELETE FROM SalesHistory WHERE sale_quantity >= 50 AND sale_date < '2021-10-01';
DELETE FROM Inventory WHERE product_id = 200 AND in_stock_quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE quantity_in_stock < 10 OR quantity_in_stock > 100;
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE quantity_in_stock > 100 AND last_updated < '2022-01-01';
